C A R EE R  O B J E C T I V E S  
To succeed in an environment of growth and excellence and earn a job which              
provides me job satisfaction  and  self - development  that  will  help  in  achieving  personal  and  
organizational  goals.  Hard  work and  team  spirit  thereby  anticipating  and  meeting  the  
challenges  arising  in  the  contemporary  competitive business  environment  with  integrity  
while  discharging  my  duties.  
 
EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND  
   2011 - 2015:    Kenyatta  University  Bachelors of Commerce (Actuarial                         
Science) Second Class Honors -  Upper  Division  
2007 –  2010 : Bungoma  High School  Kenya Certificate of Secondary 
Education (K.C.S.E) Mean grade  A -  (Minus)  
1999 - 2006:  Lugulu Boys Primary Kenya Certificate of Primary  Education 
(K.C.P.E 344 Marks)  
 
SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS  
o  Excellent  written  and  verbal  communication  
o  Proficient  in  Microsoft  office  (Word,  PowerPoint  and  Excel)  
o  Skilled  in  data  collection  using CAPI  
o  Excellent  in  computation  of  Mathematical  and  Accounting  
o  Strong  leadership  skills;  able  to  prioritize,  delegate  tasks,  and  make  sound  decisions   
o  Experi enced in marketing and business 
research  
 
PERSONAL  ATTRIBUTES  
o  Can  quickly  learn  and  adapt  to  any  new  or  varying  working  environment.  
o  Possess  creative  mind  with  excellent  problem  solving  skills  
o  Flexible  with  working  long  hours  in  different  environment  
o  Motivated,  persuasive  and  goal  oriented.  
o  Attention to  details  
o  Team - player and requires minimal  supervision   
      ACHIEVEMENTS  
o  Completed  survey  project  in  time  with  KNBS  while  conducting  a  census  
for  Business Establishments  in  Bungoma  County.  
o  Helped  students  improve  academic  performance  in  Mathematics  and  
Business  Studies  by  30 %  while working as a volunteer teacher at 
Stanmore High School.  
o  Best  student  leader  in  Bungoma  High  School  in  academics.  
o  Production  improved  steadily  by  a  margin  of  3%  over  three  months  with  zero  
complains  on packaging  and  quality  of  the  flou r  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 WORKING EXPERIENCE  
 
1.  Production Supervisor -  Faulu Flour Mills, Jan -  June 2018  
Maintained work flow in the factory by monitoring the production process, 
observing control points and equipment, monitoring personnel and resources, 
implementing cost reduction, developed reporting procedures and appraising job 
results.  
 
Duties and Responsibilities  
o  Ensure  the  good  quality  of  the  processed  maize  flour.  
o  Take  charge  of  operations  when  the  manager  is  not  around  
o  Assist  any  new  or  inexpert  workers  get  necessary  training  
o  Efficiently  supported  employer’s  core  values  of  safety,  quality  and  people  
o  Provide  guidance  and  leadership  to  employees  
o  Manage  shift  inventory  and  maintain  work  instructions  
o  Maintained  cleaning  of  area  and  equipment  
 
 
2 . R e s e a r c h  A ss i s t a n t  K e n y a  N a t i o n a l  B u r e a u  o f  S t a t i s t i c s -  J a n -  M a y  201 7  
The  Census  aimed  at  investigating  the  economic  activity  and  structure  of       
establishments  at  the  National and  County  levels.  The  information  obtained  from  the  
Census  was  mainly  used  for  updating  the  business register  to  provide  a  sampling  
frame work  for  conducting  various  establishment  based  surveys.  
 
Key Responsibilities  
o  Identify  suitable  techniques  for  the  collection  and  analysis  of  data.  
o  Assisting  in  the  development  &  preparation  of  research  schedules  and  budgeting  
o  Travelling  to  pre - sampled  business  entities  and  research  visits  in  other  institutions.  
o  Contributing  to  team  decisions  about  research  directions.  
o  Ensuring  the  validity  and  reliability  of  data  at  all  times.  
o  Data  coding,  data  entry,  transcribing,  data  analysis  &  assistance  with  writing  up.  
o  Producing  regular  reports  for  analysis  and  publication  
 
 
3.  Business  Researcher  Metropol  Limited  Corporation  (October  2015)  
The market  survey  for  credit  rating  in  the  Small  and  Medium  Enterprise  Businesses  in  
Bungoma County sought  to  assess  the  credit  worthiness  of  the  businesses  and  how  
accessibility  of credit  from  suppliers  and  financial  service  providers  and  its  impact  on  
business es  
 
 Duties & Responsibilities  
 
o  Traveling  to  the  field  sites  to  collect  and  record  data  as  appropriate  to  the  specific  
objectives  of the  study.  
o  Filling  and  verifying  reports  in  the  provided  templates  and  enter  data  into  computer  
database  for subsequent  analysis.  
o  Assist in the development of interview schedules; contacting subjects to 
introduce and explain study  objectives  and  protocol,  and  to  arrange  interviews,  
either  in  person  or  by  telephone.  
o  Reviewing  and  editing  data  to  ensure  completeness  and  accuracy  of  information;  
following  up with  the  subjects  to  resolve  problems  or  clarify  data  collected.  4. I n t e r n  a t  t h e  R e v e nu e  D e p a r t m e n t .  C o un t y  G o v e r n m e n t  o f  B un g o m a  (  S e p t e m b e r  2014 -           J a nu a r y  2015 )  
 
DUTIES &RESPONSIBILITIES  
o  Revenue  analysis  for  the  County  
o  Kept  the  primary  books  of  Accounts.  
o  Maintained  Revenue  Records  including  S.B.P  and  Asset  Registers.  
o  U p d a t ed  G e n e r a l  L e d g e r s  a n d  j o u r n a l s .  
o  Bank Reconciliation  statements.  
o  Maintained Receipts and Payments Cash  Books
